nws_periods.name: Today
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Sunny, with a high near 93. Heat index values as high as 109. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
